attributes.action: We call upon the Government to provide financial assistance to British Steel.
attributes.additional_details:
Around 5,000 jobs are at risk at British Steel, a further 20,000 are at risk through the loss of business to British Steel’s suppliers. 

Whole communities will be decimated by the collapse of British Steel. A financial stimulus is needed now.
attributes.background:
British Steel is on the verge of financial collapse, losing this business would decimate communities throughout the UK. 

We call upon the government to provide an immediate and sustained package of financial support, tax breaks and levies on foreign imports.
